title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 820.2 - Commercial driver's license standards and controlled substances and alcohol use and testing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 820.2 - Commercial driver's license standards and controlled substances and alcohol use and testing

State Regulations
(a) The

Commissioner of Transportation adopts part 383 of title 49 of the

Code
of Federal Regulations
(CFR) with the same force and effect as though
herein fully set forth at length for every person and to all employers of such
persons who operate a commercial motor vehicle in intrastate, interstate, or
foreign commerce, and is subject to the commercial driver's license
requirements pursuant to of the Vehicle and Traffic Law section 501-a and this

Part. (b) The Commissioner of

Transportation adopts part
382
of title 49 CFR with the same force and effect
as though herein fully set forth at length for every person and to all
employers of such persons who operate a commercial motor vehicle in commerce, and is subject to the commercial driver's license requirements pursuant to

Vehicle and Traffic Law section 501-a and 49 CFR part
395. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
820.2

Adopted

New

York State Register June 24, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 25, eff. 7/1/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
